meanings.definition: To make audible or capable of being heard.
meanings.sent1: She audibilized her thoughts by speaking out loud.
meanings.sent2: The teacher audibilized the instructions for the students.
meanings.sent3: The cat audibilized its hunger by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The music audibilized the emotions of the composer.
meanings.sent5: The alarm audibilized the urgency of the situation.

meanings.definition: Made audible or capable of being heard.
meanings.sent1: The audibilized message was clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The audibilized sound filled the room with music.
meanings.sent3: The audibilized book was perfect for the visually impaired.
meanings.sent4: The audibilized warning saved them from danger.
meanings.sent5: The audibilized voice soothed her anxious mind.
